column4: hello all! i have an issue with firefox 17.0 in precise after an update. the horizontal scroll was set for navigating back and forward and it no longer works. now in the about:config  http://picpaste.com/pics/YgazIkzW.1353683014.png the types are all strings and they need to be; integer, integer, boolean, respectively but only user created preferences can be deleted. could someone point me in the right direction to delete these default prefere
:/ thanks i didn't see that in the list
